Get matched with the best-fit trade license to gain instant access to JAFZA’s vibrant business ecosystem, cutting-edge business facilities, strategic trade routes, and tax incentives. faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to register a Jebel Ali FZ business?
items.answer: Our expert business consultants can help you secure your trade license and set up your business in 1-14 working days.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch my business in Jebel Ali Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need passport, visa, license, and Emirates ID copies, business plan, an MoA, and board resolution, depending on your selected business activity and company structure.

items.question: Do I need a local service agent to set up in Jebel Ali FZ?
items.answer: No, JAFZA offers expats 100% foreign ownership and full repatriation of profits and capital, eliminating the need for a local agent or sponsor.

items.question: Can I own multiple businesses in Jebel Ali Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, JAFZA allows business owners to own mutliple businesses, open countless branches, and exchange in any currency across the globe.

items.question: What legal structures can I choose from Jebel Ali Free Zone?
items.answer: JAFZA allows business owners to pick one of four business models, including branch of a foreign company, Free Zone company, Free Zone establishment, and branch of a UAE company.
